00168                      uint16 angle = MAX_UINT16) : m_packetIDs(4) {

00170             m_lon = lon;
00171             m_angle = angle;
00172             m_minDist = MAX_UINT32;
00173             m_outDataTypes = outDataTypes;
00174             m_nbrItemTypes = nbrItemTypes;
00175             m_itemTypes = new byte[nbrItemTypes];
00176             memcpy(m_itemTypes, itemTypes, nbrItemTypes);
00177             m_replyPacket = NULL;
00178          }
00179          virtual ~CoordNotice() {
00180             delete [] m_itemTypes;
00181             delete m_replyPacket;
00182          }
